pageDescription: Understanding the science and engineering behind LIXI energy storage systems.

lifepo4.title: LiFePO4 Chemistry
lifepo4.description: Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4) is the safest and most stable lithium battery chemistry available. Unlike NMC batteries, LiFePO4 cells have a strong phosphate bond that prevents thermal runaway.

features.title: Superior Safety
features.desc: No thermal runaway risk. Stable chemistry even under extreme conditions.

features.title: Long Cycle Life
features.desc: 6000-8000+ cycles at 80-90% DoD. 3-4x longer than NMC batteries.

bms.title: Advanced BMS
bms.description: Our Battery Management Systems provide real-time monitoring, active balancing, and intelligent protection to maximize performance and lifespan.

features.title: Cell-Level Monitoring
features.desc: Individual cell voltage, temperature, and current tracking.

features.title: Active Balancing
features.desc: Ensures all cells charge and discharge evenly for optimal performance.

features.title: Multi-Layer Protection
features.desc: Overvoltage, undervoltage, overcurrent, and temperature protection.

features.title: Communication Protocols
features.desc: CANBUS, RS485, Bluetooth for seamless inverter integration.
